author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10777] Restart Embedded Thrift Server in case of failures
When the overall load on the embedded thrift server increases, the
TThreadedThriftServer crashes. The RegionServer is still alive and
serving regions but clients talking to embedded thrift server cannot
This is a hack for now to restart the embedded thrift server in case
of such failures. TThreadedThriftServer is outdated and we are planning to
get rid of the proxy thrift server moving forward. Hence, I have added
Test Plan: existing MR unit tests. Test it on couple of RS on SH003

author: liyin
msg: Reviewers: manukranthk, fan, liyintang, aaiyer, rshroff

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-10747] Fix the Online Config reload script to work with Swift
Summary: Adela discovered that the Online Config reloading script was broken. I traced the problem to the script using the Hadoop RPC port, which is turned off by default.
Reviewers: adela, rshroff, manukranthk, liyintang, aaiyer

author: liyin
msg: [master] Fix compatible problem of TestLogRolling with JUnit 4
Summary: `setUp` and `tearDown` are marked as `@Before` and `@After` but they are not `public`, create two public methods to call them, respectively.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-7099][89-fb] Fixed compaction hook metrics and detected a problem
CompactionHook.transform(..) is assuming the client doesn't change the passed
RestrictedKeyValue and because of that metric for transformed keyvalues didn't work.
Fixed that and ran on one machine on tsh58: https://fburl.com/16574871
Test Plan: ran on tsh58 and it works: https://fburl.com/16574871
